nodes.text: The Orphaned Marauder's Cave was a cave on the Forest moon of Endor.

The Orphaned Marauder's Cave served as a haven for a small group of exiled Sanyassan Marauders during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The cave, located near the Mertuen Forest, was visited by a number of intrepid spacers following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY. The outside of the cave was patrolled by Sanyassans, and a small tent could also be found nearby. Human smuggler Lavina also used the outside of the cave as a base for her shady activities.
